tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"技能：水生","italic": false,"color":"aqua"}',Lore:['{"text":"入水时会自动发动，使你在 3 秒内免疫水的伤害。","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"如果技能结束后仍在水中，技能会再次自动发动，","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"直至次数耗尽。","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"技能的剩余时间会显示在经验槽。","color":"gray","italic": false}','""','[{"text":"✳ 冷却  ","italic": false,"color":"aqua"},{"text":"20 秒","italic": false,"color":"white"},{"text":"      ⚜ 储存  ","italic": false,"color":"gold"},{"text":"2 次","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"✏ 细节  按 [","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"keybind":"key.drop"}, "] 收起详情"]']},HideFlags:63}
